name: Tesla's Dream
description:
Help Nicola Tesla power on all his coil towers in this challenging puzzle game.

The game consist of four levels. More levels to come!

Enjoy and leave a comment!

How To Play

Joypad or controller (recommended):

  • Move: stick
  • Action: Fire button (A)

Mouse and keyboard:

  • Move: WASD or arrow keys 
  • Action: Space bar or left mouse button.
Global Game Jam 2018

This game was submitted for the Global Game Jam 2018. See  https://globalgamejam.org/2018/games/teslas-dream
